mapper.select: select promotion_id,promotion_content, promotion_name, promotion_img from promotion

SELECT a.promotion_id, a.promotion_content,a.promotion_name,a.promotion_img,a.discount, b.ticket_id ,b.ticket_name,b.ticket_price FROM promotion a JOIN ticket b ON a.promotion_id = b.promotion_id WHERE a.promotion_id = #{promotion_id};

SELECT a.order_id,a.member_id,a.order_date,a.checkorder,a.checkrefund,b.quantity,c.ticket_name,c.ticket_price, d.promotion_content,d.promotion_name,d.promotion_img,d.discount,e.a_name FROM orders a JOIN orders_detail b ON a.order_id = b.order_id JOIN ticket c ON b.ticket_id = c.ticket_id JOIN promotion d ON c.promotion_id = d.promotion_id JOIN amusement e ON e.amuse_id = d.amuse_id WHERE member_id=#{member_id} AND b.quantity <> 0 ORDER BY a.order_id desc;

SELECT a.order_id,a.member_id,a.order_date,a.checkorder,a.checkrefund,b.quantity,c.ticket_name,c.ticket_price, d.promotion_content,d.promotion_name,d.promotion_img,d.discount,e.a_name FROM orders a JOIN orders_detail b ON a.order_id = b.order_id JOIN ticket c ON b.ticket_id = c.ticket_id JOIN promotion d ON c.promotion_id = d.promotion_id JOIN amusement e ON e.amuse_id = d.amuse_id WHERE member_id=#{member_id} AND b.quantity <> 0 ORDER BY a.order_id desc;

SELECT a.order_id,a.member_id,a.order_date,a.checkorder,a.checkrefund,b.quantity,c.ticket_name,c.ticket_price, d.promotion_content,d.promotion_name,d.promotion_img,d.discount,e.a_name FROM orders a JOIN orders_detail b ON a.order_id = b.order_id JOIN ticket c ON b.ticket_id = c.ticket_id JOIN promotion d ON c.promotion_id = d.promotion_id JOIN amusement e ON e.amuse_id = d.amuse_id WHERE member_id=#{member_id} and a.order_id=#{order_id} ORDER BY a.order_id;
